page.title: 07KILBURN(DERBY)AREA RELIGION
page.content: The national decline in church_going is less evident in our area, and a number of organisations connected with churches are thriving. Sunday schools, youth clubs, scouting and guiding organisations, young wives and clubs for pensioners all play their part in the community life. Although our area has no synagogoues, mosques or temples, it does have five different denominations of Christian church. Nearby Derby has a Quaker meeting_house and Langley Mill has a Jehovah's Witness (Kingdom Hall). Belper has a thriving Peace Group. All this is a result of mounting concern over the international nuclear arms race. Local people have also played thier part in helping those suffering in the famines of Ethopia and Sudan.
